website_summaries.verdict: This serum boasts a reduction in acne scars in one week, as well as fading other skin blemishes and boosting moisture.
pros: Reduces acne scars and inflammation in under a week
Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while boosting collagen
Formulated with natural and organic ingredients
cons: Packaging is not ideal for efficient, effective use of all the product

customer_reviews.title: Did the opposite of what it claims
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product thinking it was going to improve my skin based on the claims and ingredients described in their Amazon description. The reviews were high so I figured it was worth taking a chance for $60 as the reviews speak volumes. Well, it made my face break out more than I have ever broke out and I wasn’t having horrible breakouts, just a few. It never reduced the scars nor help heal the breakouts and it dried out my skin. I am so disappointed in this product and regret wasting my money on it. I do question all of the ingredients as they are not detailed on the bottle. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Really Like this Product!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine turned me on to this product. As a man I do admit I am a little vain about my skin - its always been one of my better features haha. Started using this serum and I have noticed a healthier appearance as well as some of my color has regulated! Also some of my minor scars from my acne days have started to look less severe (which I am super pleased about) all in all I think this product has started to help my skin heal without having to go to more drastic means.
customer_reviews.author: Josh F.

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with acne for over a decade. I've spent thousands of dollars going to the dermologist and buying all this prescribed creams, which none of them never worked. I'm already on day 3 using this product and I have yet to had a breakout. My old acne scars seemed to be fading away. This product seems to good to be true but it works, I know it's pricey but this stuff really works.
customer_reviews.author: STXbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Visibly saw results after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Only been using this for about 8 days so far but my brown spots from old sunburns are like 50 % lighter and my acne scars are almost gone. I have tried laser and hydraquinone but this works faster and I feel like it is much healthier and cleaner. So worth it
customer_reviews.author: D Zeiger

customer_reviews.title: Natural the best will give it 10 stars if I could😍
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for over a year and is by far the best natural product I’ve ever used. I shave sensitive/skin and I rarely use makeup so I’m the happiest person ever. I would breakout and get dark pigmentation because of my tan skin tone. I swear by this product and it’s Vegan 🌱 amazing amazing product. Please Amazon don’t ever discontinue this product. They were out last month I was like 😳freaking out 😫I had to get the sample size by far the best 💯 improvement with time and also healthy eating. Also vitamins/vegan friendly.
customer_reviews.author: mitzy24k

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeeeee it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this serum! It’s helped fade my acne scars and makes my skin feel so soft. My skin is often very irritated and inflamed and this is one of the only products I’ve found that helps calm it down. It’s instantly soothing when I put it on each night. It’s also really light and absorbs right into my skin without leaving a film so it can be worn under makeup. I use it morning or night or both! Definitely try it out of you’re dealing with acne/scarring.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Despite the positive reviews, it did not work for me
customer_reviews.author: Dely

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product to add to your anti-acne, anti-aging skin care regimen
customer_reviews.text: I feel so grateful I have found this serum. Being an adult with acne is no fun. I’ve tried it all with little to no results. About a year ago, I started to use “Face Reality” products which have been wonderful. I incorporated this serum into my regimen and it has been a total transformation. Not only with acne, but with wrinkles as well!!! Thrilled not to have to worry about breaking out during my cycle any longer. Give it 15 minutes to really absorb before putting lotion on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No changes in my skin
customer_reviews.text: I used this product everyday for about a month and a half and sadly I did not see any change in my skin. I really wanted this to work. I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Now part of my daily routine!
customer_reviews.text: I've used CLEARstem for the past few months (both in the morning and at night). I have some acne scarring around my face and even though I'm past my hormonal teen acne days, I still struggle with keeping my skin clear. Once I started using CLEARstem, I noticed my skin cleared up and was looking more "even" after a few weeks. I delayed in replenishing my supply and INSTANTLY noticed a negative change in my skin when I wasn't using CLEARstem. I was breaking out again and my skin looked dull again. I'm now on my second bottle and I still absolutely love the results. Definitely worth a purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Delaney-Mendieta

customer_reviews.title: This product literally saved my skin...
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered this product when I made an appointment with Danielle at San Diego Acne Clinic. She took my through a 45 minute consultation followed by an incredible facial. This serum was a big component of the facial and I asked her what she was using on my face as it felt so incredible. From that moment on, I have been using this serum everyday and my skin could not thank me more. I have struggled with acne for years, and this product has not only helped diminish the blemishes, but also helped scarring and overall complexion. A serious skin saver! I have been recommending it to everyone :)
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: No funky smell
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday but so far the bottle I got a the one pictured above so it’s white glass bottle with blue labeling and I do not like the squirtter top because it comes out dumb, it doesn’t squirt out all pretty. so basicallly.. messy, be prepared to catch this pricey stuff in your hand. I’ll keep you posted on if it actually works since I’m using it for my acne scarring
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: It does everything...
customer_reviews.text: I will be honest. I was hesitant to try this at first. I mean, it's so expensive! But this has the "Amazon's Choice" badge as well as a really awesome rating and wonderfully crafted reviews that I truly felt convinced. I'd like to say that this might be the best facial serum that I've tried yet. This thing does everything. Reduces wrinkles and fine lines, hydrates and brightens the skin, reduces acne scars, prevent acne breakouts. It does everything without being harsh and irritating to the skin. This is expensive, but the product is well worth its price. The price is supremely justified by how awesome this works.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: This product got rid of my scars and acne!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING!!! It practically made my scars and acne vanish in just a week, it's insane! I put it on every morning after washing my face and at night just before I go to bed--works best for me at these times! A little goes a long way, and it's a smooth feeling that's not drying at all (unlike all the other super drying acne products i've used in the past), which is really nice because I have naturally dryer skin. I take it with me on the road and it keeps my skin in check while traveling. This stem cell serum works MIRACLES! Strongly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: puzzler

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing serum you can buy
customer_reviews.text: I got hooked on this product originally when I got my first facial from the owner of the company a few years a go. I have used it ever sine and even got my fiance hooked on it. It leaves your skin feeling so amazing!! My skin was bright, softer and smooth!! It also worked wonders on my fiances broken capillaries. Do not hesitate, just by it! You wont regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Margo Bradley

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. It helps to keep my skin clear, hydrated and really helps with post acne marks. Ive been using this stuff for almost a year and its the one serum I can not be with out. Ive suffered from acne for many years and this has really made a difference in my skin. It also helps with anti aging. My skin looks more youthful and firm. Ive tried everything out there and this is the only serum that has worked wonders for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jeria

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a week after breaking out in my hormonal area for several months at 25. I switched birth control, cut out dairy and gluten and couldn't figure out what was happening to my skin. I get facials regularly and use organic products. Nothinggggg worked until I started using THIS! I'm probably going to never stop ordering this. After one week my chin area has cleared up and the acne scars are fainting. I'm shooooook!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Blair

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing, really effective
customer_reviews.text: I'm super embarrassed about my complexion because it's covered in acne scars, especially around my cheeks. I'm heading to college soon and I don't want to be judged there as well. I've tried all sorts of products and none of them have worked until I came across this one. Within a span of days since I've used this, I haven't gotten a new pimple which is pretty rare for me. My old scars, while not completely disappearing, have started to fade as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kinchie

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Serum!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been hooked on this serum for almost a year now. It’s my holy grail for soothing and hydrating my skin after cleansing, and I’ve noticed a reduction in cysts and blackheads that I used to regularly get! It wasn’t instant but I ran out of this for a month and couldn’t wait to get it back in! I’ve used it on scratches from my cat as well since I scar super easily, and it helped them heal pretty perfectly. I also recently had a rash under my eye (possibly the start of eczema) and this serum totally soothed and healed that patch!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING. I have been using this for a few months now and I cannot believe how well it works! I put it on my face every night before bed, and occasionally in the mornings as well. I have seen scars from my most recent acne outbreak clear in just a couple weeks (normally the scars take many months to heal on their own!) I get so many compliments on how healthy my skin is looking. I've even been using the serum on a scar on my arm I've had for a year and it's fading as well! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: 1) I really like the feel of this serum on my skin! It's hydrating and light, not oily or heavy feeling. 2) It makes my skin feel bright and redness reduced immediately on application. 3) I'm thrilled that the ingredients are all natural, and non-toxic. I look forward to seeing the results after long-term use. I don't have acne, but I bought this to improve the clarity and brightness of my skin, and decongest pores, and anti-aging promises.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: It gives a lot of improvement on my son's skin
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for my 14-year-old son because his skin care treatments weren't enough to combat his acne. This one though worked like a charm. He hasn't had a single outbreak of acne since he started using this. His skin is starting to clear up and his old scars are already fading away.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not to sure about this
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday, granted I don't put it on both day and night like it says, I don't see much change in my acne going away... I will say that I don't see as much acne coming on though. So maybe I just need to wait a little longer and it'll start helping keep my skin clear 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: A Skincare Staple
customer_reviews.text: This product has become a major staple in my skin care routine along with the other products I was recommended at San Diego Acne Clinic. It goes on very smooth and keeps my skin moisturized. Something extremely important to note with ANY skincare product is that it takes time and consistency to see long-lasting results. Don't give up on a product because you don't see a miracle overnight!
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: One Serum That Does Everything
customer_reviews.text: This CLEARstem serum is a dream. I've been using it for a few months now. It treats and prevents my acne, while also fading acne scars and marks. And, I love that it's anti-aging too. My skin is glowing. I'm switching all my products to non-toxic ones, and this is one of the cleanest I've seen, plus no irritating fragrances added. I use it after washing my face and using toner, under my moisturizer, 2x a day. I've even traveled with it, and the bottle doesn't leak. I'm so glad I found CLEARstem and can't imagine ever using another serum!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Wroten

customer_reviews.title: This really works - I am so happy with my skin for the first time in my life.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many things to help the condition of my skin, and I believe my acne had a lot to do with my hormones. I use this twice a day, and my skin over the past 2 months I have used this product has dramatically improved. Scabs heal much faster when i use this. This is my miracle product and I will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: toddlerM0M&proud

customer_reviews.title: Love this product! Specially now in the winter.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 1 month now and I am so glad I bought when I did. I live in San Diego(not much of a winter here) but while I was on a recent trip to the east coast, my skin really hated me and I am glad I had this little bottle with me. My skin complexion seems more evenly now plus when I put this in the morning it helps with the puffiness & redness. I loved it so much that my sister and two friends bought this product as well. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Talita Barnaby

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype, IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly never take the time out to do reviews but I had to let you know that this product works( well atleast on my skin). I have been using this product for about a month, day and night and have noticed an improvement with my skin. My acne scars have improved and my outbreaks have decreased. Its pricey, but so far as I can tell, its worth it. Im a happy customer thus far and will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: kamil J hazel

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using clear stem for about 6 months and absolutely swear by it! It’s a staple in my skincare routine which is natural and minimal. I’ve noticed major improvement in texture and overall health of my skin. Occasional hormonal breakouts and congestion are no longer a major stressor. I’ve even used clear stem on burns and cuts and it’s helped my skin to heal much faster. I have a large scar on my neck from a curling iron and have been using clear stem on it and noticing a huge difference!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Acne Miracle Serum Sent Straight From the Heavens
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my daughter who has been suffering from chronic cystic acne. She has been using the product for three weeks now, and her cystic acne has diminished profoundly. Her skin is noticeably softer and healthier. As it turns out, getting rid of all products with ingredients that are pore clogging (see list in pictures of product) significantly reduced her acne. The only downside to the product is that it is a little pricey for the amount in the bottle, but she learned that a small amount of the product goes a long way! Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hajnik

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well...
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well for my 15-year-old son. His acne was getting so bad that we had to visit several dermatologists but none of them have helped. We came across this product and gave it a try. Now my son's face is clearing up amazingly fast. He's had no new breakouts and his face has even gotten smoother as well.
customer_reviews.author: Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Nourishes and brightens face
customer_reviews.text: I went to visit my daughter recently and she shared this Clearstem with me. I went home and ordered it. As you get older it gets harder to keep your face nourished and clear of any adult acne. I go to the dermatologist frequently and I spend a lot of money on cremes and lotions. This is a product I can recommend and state clearly that it works. I use it twice a day on my face and neck and I love how refreshed my skin feels. I would encourage you to try it; make it part of your skin regiment.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Delaney

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! It helps with my dry skin and pimples! I don't break out a lot but when I did it was bad. I would say my pimples go away within 24-48 hours ! Also tI love that I bring on an airplane when I travel. It helps reduce dry skin or breakouts while flying! I can't say enough about this product I love it and will continue to buy it !

customer_reviews.text: I have super dry and uneven skin and this has totally transformed my face in only a week! The product not only smells amazing, but sinks completely into the skin and doesn’t leave a residue on top like a lot of other serums I’ve tried! I would highly recommend this product to anyone who has dry patches, uneven texture, redness, or just wants to improve the health of their skin! I will definitely be repurchasing!

customer_reviews.text: Effectively got rid of my son's acne problems. His skin has been clearing up since he started using this. He's only been using this and a normal face wash, but his complexion is starting to look better. Old scars are fading faster and making his skin look much clearer.

customer_reviews.text: It feels good on the skin. It leaves a soothing effect which helps me fall asleep every night. In the morning, I don't see or feel any oily residue on my face which primarily causes pimples or breakouts to emerge. This is totally worth the buy. Just make sure that you use this consistently.

customer_reviews.text: Great for hormonal acne and acne scars! All of the products in this line are wonderful and actually do not clog your pores (unlike other products that claim the same but increase acne)

So far, I haven't had a single breakout in weeks and most of the pimples I already have on my face are quickly disappearing. My face overall looks much cleaner and fresher now thanks to this.

customer_reviews.title: No more monthly acne with my period!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I had suffered from hormonal cystic acne each month. After starting to use this, each month during my cycle, my acne is gone and I’m no longer in pain. I also have noticed that the fine lines I was beginning to see are reducing as well. This is a great product and I can’t recommend it enough to others. What a huge change in my skin care routine! I would purchase any other products that they come up with.

customer_reviews.text: I can not recommend this product highly enough. I’ve struggled with acne and pigmentation all my life, and this is the first thing that’s ever given me real results. It’s made my skin young and firm again, and perfectly clear. I’ve already recommended it to all my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Basso

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This serum helps me look young again. Wrinkly face no more. Pricey but effective. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Edilyn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful HEALING product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING for rejuvenating your skin. I find that when I do have breakouts, they heal much faster when I am applying Clearstem once a day. It has also been very helpful in repairing my dermatology scars from areas after a mole removal. It has been life-changing for my naturally sensitive skin!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison N.

customer_reviews.title: It works! I am a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: This has truly been a life-saver! Sure, it is expensive, but if it works, why not? This is worth every penny that I paid for it and I am sure that I'll be using this for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: My face is left feeling completely clean and rejuvenated after use.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a little over a month now and i’ve noticed a difference in my skin. My face looks and feels healthier. Cleaner. I look forward to using this product in the morning and night because I truly think the more I use it, the more improvement I see. Plus it smells good. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Muratore

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! It’s helped so much with the texture of my skin. I have struggled with scarring from cystic acne and this serum has been a miracle for smoothing my skin. Also helps prevent acne while leaving my face moisturized for the whole day. Glowing!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Prefect skin in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this well over a year now and love it! Keeps my skin hydrated while preventing blemishes. It’s also super soothing and calming to my redness prone skin. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vanni

customer_reviews.title: Light dries fast, good serum.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so far, definitely leaves skin soft but so far that’s it. Will continue use and update review.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! Put it on and it doesn't feel greasy or oily. Waiting too see if it has the intended results.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with acne for as long as I can remember. Using everything under the sun, this stuff is liquid gold! Not only does it brighten my skin but it is safe for my acne and I trust the clean ingredients! I just bought my 4th bottle as I can never be without it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: My skin is clearer than it's ever been!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product makes my skin feel and is very effective at fighting those pesky cystic underground zits before they even find their way to the surface. 10/10 would recommend to anybody struggling with hormonal acne!
customer_reviews.author: Courtlyn Jones

customer_reviews.title: SKIN GLOW IN A BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: This product hands down is liquid gold. I have been on a journey of balancing my hormones and not only is this product SAFE for us to use it WORKS! I would recommend this to anyone with acne or looking to have their skin glow and fight anti-aging!
customer_reviews.author: Modernally Balanced

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for almost a year now, I believe, and I can't get enough of it. I know it's done wonders for my skin, plus I love how tight it makes my skin feel after applying it. :) Love all the ingredients in it and the maker behind it as well!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! My skin looks absolutely amazing after I sleep with it on, I wake up glowing. I saw a difference after just one use, but it keeps getting better and better. It's nearly impossible to find something anti-acne that is also moisturizing, but this is it!
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Better than accutane
customer_reviews.text: I’ve struggled with acne since 5th grade and this product is one of the only products I’ve found that keeps my skin completely clear and I’ve even noticed some reduction in my scarring. I’ve been on accutane twice and this product alone worked much better! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steam Cells are The Future !!!
customer_reviews.text: I would call this GODS JUICE !! My face has never shined brighter! Really enjoy Quality products like this and first time using stem cell based product , really enjoy It !!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin cho

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, recently I've been traveling and didn't bring any of my face products with me. This product helps reduce my black heads and helps tighten my skin. Highly suggest it for smaller pores and softer skin.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for months now and can really tell a difference when I do not apply the product. It really does help with your skins overall appearance. I HIGHLY recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: William T Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is truly magic in a bottle! Not only does it help my skin not produce any more new breakouts, but it significantly helped with my scarring and brown spots I had all over my face. Would highly recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: In all good product just pricy
customer_reviews.text: Worked for the time being for breakouts but idk it's expensive in my opinion unless you are following up with a microneedle treatments to gain full effect.In all good product just pricy.
customer_reviews.author: Michkaleas

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product!! My skin has never been so healthy. This is truly magic in a bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few weeks now. Very hydrating and noticing some improvements with scaring and my overall complexion. It did not make any difference (good or bad) with acne.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this serum for over two weeks now and see a definate improvement in the texture and tone of my skin. Absolutely impressed with this product and will continue to use and update on results.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G.

customer_reviews.title: My skins feels so healthy with CLEARstem!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing my skin has never been clearer and more hydrated. I have stuggled with breakouts along with dry skin for years and my skin has never felt healthier with clearstem.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: My skin has never been better
customer_reviews.text: I have very difficult to manage combination skin and until now nothing had worked for me. This is some of the best money I've ever spent, I wish I had known about it sooner. I followed the instructions as closely as I could and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Works decently well
customer_reviews.text: I definitely see a difference in my skin. I incorporate it with my other coctails of skincare!
customer_reviews.author: celyne

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good serum, it absorbs well into the skin but ...
customer_reviews.text: I used an entire bottle, morning and night religiously, until I ran out. Lasted me a little over a month. I did not notice any dramatic changes in my acne scars. It’s a good serum, it absorbs well into the skin but I still broke out while I used the serum (hormonal acne).
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: so a product of $60 per ounce could be easily tampered. Is this how poorly the product is ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle came with no seal at all, so a product of $60 per ounce could be easily tampered. Is this how poorly the product is being marketed or I got a used one? It is truly disgusting when I really think about it, especially I am not feeling well after using it once. I have to return the crap.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My skin heals faster when I use it consistently!
customer_reviews.author: Jentri Sinor

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Has been the only serum to get my acne under control. I even have less hormonal acne since using it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Phillips

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this product. I have been using for over a year.. it is light and my face feels even more clean once I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well for the small little bumps all over my chin and neck and makes my skin smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Prima R Barischoff

customer_reviews.title: YES.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the only thing that has helped my skin get better. I still have a while to go, but I’m thankful for this!
customer_reviews.author: scarlett

product_meta.title: CELLrenew by CLEARstem - Anti-Aging Peptide & DNA Repair Serum, Collagen Stem Cell - Topical Facial Serum & Hyaluronic Acid - Hydration Moisturizer, Scar Removal & Acne-Safe - Made in USA - 1 fl oz
feature_bullets: ►REDUCTION of ACNE SCARS & INFLAMMATION in under a week! Natural & Organic - Powerful Anti-Aging Formulation - Proven to Reduce Appearance of Wrinkles & Fine Lines While Helping Boost Collagen, Fade Sun & Age Spots and Improved Skin Firming, Brightening, and Tone for a Smoother, Fresher, More Revitalized Youthful Complexion. Antioxidants neutralize free radicals to prevent and reverse sun damage and fade sun spots and discoloration. May provide tingling or cooling sensation.

►THE DIFFERENCE in skin treated with Clearstem Anti Aging Serum is striking. In addition to its powerful hydrating properties, customers have reported that this proprietary facial serum has helped to shrink pores, clear up acne, prevent breakouts, and minimize the appearance of acne scars - leaving skin proudly radiating a healthier appearance that glows.

►HIGHEST QUALITY INGREDIENTS - Formulated with only the highest quality natural & organic ingredients, and nothing more. Clearstem chooses not to compromise the formula with added chemicals to artificially hide normal variations in the color of the ingredients, or perfumes to cover up their natural scent. This concentrated stem cell serum has not only been proven to be effective, but it's surprisingly gentle too, and the perfect solution for even the most sensitive skin types.

►HYDRATE & HEAL ACNE SCARS without creating new breakouts. Two critical ingredients are Green Tea and Mushroom extract, which are known as “adaptogens” that help your skin maintain stability despite all the stress it encounters. Active acne and scabs heal about 3X faster and dark spots fade quickly thanks to the bio-available collagen stem cells. Acne Scar Removal
► MADE IN USA & CRUELTY FREE - Clearstem Skincare Products Are Proudly Formulated Right Here In the USA in a GMP certified facility and Are Never Tested On Animals
